traits.name: Brave
entries: Tiberius Inuus has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Tiberius Inuus makes three melee attacks.

actions.name: Flametongue
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6 damage) fire damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +5 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 6 (1d10 + 1 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Touch of Sune
entries: Tiberius Inuus touches a creature. The target magically regains 40 Hit Points and is freed from any disease or poison.
